SnapEnhance - An Xposed module offering an enhanced Snapchat experience

About | Log | Files | Refs | Submodules | License

release.yml (6892B) - raw

      1 name: Release CI
      2 on:
      3   workflow_dispatch:
      4     inputs:
      5       prerelease:
      6         description: 'Mark as Pre-release'
      7         required: false
      8         type: boolean
      9       publish:
     10         description: 'Publish release'
     11         required: false
     12         type: boolean
     13         default: true
     14 jobs:
     15   job_armv8:
     16     runs-on: macos-latest
     17     steps:
     18       - name: Checkout repo
     19         uses: actions/checkout@v4
     20         with:
     21           submodules: 'recursive'
     22 
     23       - name: Set up JDK 21
     24         uses: actions/setup-java@v4
     25         with:
     26           java-version: '21'
     27           distribution: 'temurin'
     28           cache: gradle
     29 
     30       - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew
     31         run: chmod +x gradlew
     32 
     33       - name: Setup NPM Dependencies
     34         run: npm install typescript -g
     35 
     36       - name: Build
     37         run: ./gradlew assembleArmv8Release
     38 
     39       - name: Determine the latest Build Tools version installed
     40         shell: bash
     41         run: echo "BUILD_TOOL_VERSION=$(ls "$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/" | tail -n 1)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
     42         
     43       - name: Sign APK
     44         id: sign_app
     45         uses: SnapEnhance/sign-android-release@master
     46         with:
     47           releaseDirectory: app/build/outputs/apk/armv8/release/
     48           signingKeyBase64: ${{ secrets.JAVA_KEYSTORE_DATA }}
     49           alias: ${{ secrets.KEY_ALIAS }}
     50           keyStorePassword: ${{ secrets.KEYSTORE_PASSWORD }}
     51           keyPassword: ${{ secrets.KEY_PASSWORD }}
     52         env:
     53           BUILD_TOOLS_VERSION: ${{ env.BUILD_TOOL_VERSION }}
     54       
     55       - name: Upload artifact
     56         uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
     57         with:
     58           name: snapenhance-armv8-release
     59           path: ${{steps.sign_app.outputs.signedReleaseFile}}
     60           
     61   job_armv7:
     62     runs-on: macos-latest
     63     steps:
     64       - name: Checkout repo
     65         uses: actions/checkout@v4
     66         with:
     67           submodules: 'recursive'
     68 
     69       - name: Set up JDK 21
     70         uses: actions/setup-java@v4
     71         with:
     72           java-version: '21'
     73           distribution: 'temurin'
     74           cache: gradle
     75 
     76       - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew
     77         run: chmod +x gradlew
     78 
     79       - name: Setup NPM Dependencies
     80         run: npm install typescript -g
     81 
     82       - name: Build
     83         run: ./gradlew assembleArmv7Release
     84 
     85       - name: Determine the latest Build Tools version installed
     86         shell: bash
     87         run: echo "BUILD_TOOL_VERSION=$(ls "$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/" | tail -n 1)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
     88 
     89       - name: Sign APK
     90         id: sign_app
     91         uses: SnapEnhance/sign-android-release@master
     92         with:
     93           releaseDirectory: app/build/outputs/apk/armv7/release/
     94           signingKeyBase64: ${{ secrets.JAVA_KEYSTORE_DATA }}
     95           alias: ${{ secrets.KEY_ALIAS }}
     96           keyStorePassword: ${{ secrets.KEYSTORE_PASSWORD }}
     97           keyPassword: ${{ secrets.KEY_PASSWORD }}
     98         env:
     99           BUILD_TOOLS_VERSION: ${{ env.BUILD_TOOL_VERSION }}
    100 
    101       - name: Upload artifact
    102         uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
    103         with:
    104           name: snapenhance-armv7-release
    105           path: ${{steps.sign_app.outputs.signedReleaseFile}}
    106 
    107   job_universal:
    108     runs-on: macos-latest
    109     steps:
    110       - name: Checkout repo
    111         uses: actions/checkout@v4
    112         with:
    113           submodules: 'recursive'
    114 
    115       - name: Set up JDK 21
    116         uses: actions/setup-java@v4
    117         with:
    118           java-version: '21'
    119           distribution: 'temurin'
    120           cache: gradle
    121 
    122       - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew
    123         run: chmod +x gradlew
    124 
    125       - name: Setup NPM Dependencies
    126         run: npm install typescript -g
    127 
    128       - name: Build
    129         run: ./gradlew assembleAllRelease
    130 
    131       - name: Determine the latest Build Tools version installed
    132         shell: bash
    133         run: echo "BUILD_TOOL_VERSION=$(ls "$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/" | tail -n 1)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
    134 
    135       - name: Sign APK
    136         id: sign_app
    137         uses: SnapEnhance/sign-android-release@master
    138         with:
    139           releaseDirectory: app/build/outputs/apk/all/release/
    140           signingKeyBase64: ${{ secrets.JAVA_KEYSTORE_DATA }}
    141           alias: ${{ secrets.KEY_ALIAS }}
    142           keyStorePassword: ${{ secrets.KEYSTORE_PASSWORD }}
    143           keyPassword: ${{ secrets.KEY_PASSWORD }}
    144         env:
    145           BUILD_TOOLS_VERSION: ${{ env.BUILD_TOOL_VERSION }}
    146 
    147       - name: Upload universal
    148         uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
    149         with:
    150           name: snapenhance-universal-release
    151           path: ${{steps.sign_app.outputs.signedReleaseFile}}
    152 
    153   job_manager:
    154     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    155     steps:
    156       - name: Checkout repo
    157         uses: actions/checkout@v4
    158         with:
    159           submodules: 'recursive'
    160 
    161       - name: Set up JDK 21
    162         uses: actions/setup-java@v4
    163         with:
    164           java-version: '21'
    165           distribution: 'temurin'
    166           cache: gradle
    167 
    168       - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew
    169         run: chmod +x gradlew
    170 
    171       - name: Build
    172         run: ./gradlew manager:assembleRelease
    173 
    174       - name: Determine the latest Build Tools version installed
    175         shell: bash
    176         run: echo "BUILD_TOOL_VERSION=$(ls "$ANDROID_HOME/build-tools/" | tail -n 1)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
    177 
    178       - name: Sign APK
    179         id: sign_app
    180         uses: SnapEnhance/sign-android-release@master
    181         with:
    182           releaseDirectory: manager/build/outputs/apk/release/
    183           signingKeyBase64: ${{ secrets.JAVA_KEYSTORE_DATA }}
    184           alias: ${{ secrets.KEY_ALIAS }}
    185           keyStorePassword: ${{ secrets.KEYSTORE_PASSWORD }}
    186           keyPassword: ${{ secrets.KEY_PASSWORD }}
    187         env:
    188           BUILD_TOOLS_VERSION: ${{ env.BUILD_TOOL_VERSION }}
    189 
    190       - name: Upload artifact
    191         uses: actions/upload-artifact@v4
    192         with:
    193           name: manager
    194           path: ${{steps.sign_app.outputs.signedReleaseFile}}
    195 
    196   job_release:
    197     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    198     if: ${{ inputs.publish == true }}
    199     needs: [job_armv8, job_armv7, job_universal, job_manager]
    200     steps:
    201       - name: Checkout repo
    202         uses: actions/checkout@v4
    203         with:
    204           submodules: 'recursive'
    205 
    206       - name: Set up JDK 21
    207         uses: actions/setup-java@v4
    208         with:
    209           java-version: '21'
    210           distribution: 'temurin'
    211           cache: gradle
    212 
    213       - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew
    214         run: chmod +x gradlew
    215 
    216       - name: Get current build version
    217         id: version-env
    218         run: |
    219           ./gradlew getVersion
    220           echo "version=$(cat app/build/version.txt)" >> $GITHUB_ENV
    221 
    222       - name: Download artifacts
    223         uses: actions/download-artifact@v4
    224         with:
    225           path: bins/
    226           merge-multiple: true
    227 
    228       - name: Publish APK
    229         uses: softprops/action-gh-release@v2
    230         with:
    231           token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
    232           prerelease: ${{ inputs.prerelease }}
    233           files: bins/*.apk
    234           tag_name: v${{ env.version }}
